document_title: Influenza A H5N1: Symptoms, causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: cum-a-h5n1.json_1_Symptoms of influenza A H5N1 in humans
subsection_content:
When infected with influenza A H5N1, the most common symptoms include high fever over 38 degrees, cough, sore throat, muscle pain... In some people, initial symptoms such as abdominal pain, chest pain, etc. may appear. vomiting or diarrhea.
Viral infections have a high risk of rapidly progressing to dangerous respiratory diseases (such as Acute Respiratory Syndrome - difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, pneumonia) or having neurological effects (convulsions). , appearance of abnormal mental states,...). (2)
